name: MEC Creekside 0C Double Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Great value and a good night's sleep. This synthetic bag is easy to take care of and can handle a little dampness and dirt. It's a good option for road trip, cabins, music festivals, and sleepovers. Unzips on both sides, so you can use it as a pair of comforters to fall asleep under the stars.Shell is 50-denier recycled polyester with a DWR finish to shed water and dirt.Lined in 50-denier DWR-treated polyester.Insulated with synthetic MEC Hyperloft Eco polyester insulation that's 50% recycled fibres.Shingled construction eliminates cold spots.Unzips for use as a blanket.Zip has anti-snag tape along its full length.Includes a mesh stuff sack.Bottom loops for hanging the bag.

        Sustainability
